price: （我确已派遣）鲁特，当时他对他的宗族说：“你们怎么做那种丑事呢？在你们之前，全世界的人没有一个做过这种事。
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata mā sabaqakum bihā min aḥadin mina al-ʿālamīna
